data.title: Spoetzl Brewery
data.meta_description: The Spoetzl Brewery was founded in Shiner, Texas (population 2,069), in 1909, brewing beer with old-world traditions and recipes for the many German and Czech settlers in Central Texas. Since then, the brewery has grown to be one of the largest independent craft brewers in the country, available in 49 states and Mexico. But every drop of our award-winning beer is still brewed right where it all started 108 years ago. Visit us at www.shiner.com.
data.text:
Submit news for this brewery »

The Spoetzl Brewery Announces Major New Sustainability Initiatives

The Spoetzl Brewery, the family-owned and independent craft brewer of the iconic Shiner Bock, announces its extensive new onsite sustainability initiatives.

The Spoetzl Brewery Announces Major New Sustainability Initiatives

The Spoetzl Brewery, the family-owned and independent craft brewer of the iconic Shiner Bock, announces its extensive new onsite sustainability initiatives.

Shiner Beers Brings Back Cult-Favorite: Prickly Pear Summer Lager

The independent, family-owned makers of the iconic Shiner Bock Beer announce the highly anticipated return of Prickly Pear summer lager, first introduced in 2012.

Shiner x Boot Campaign: Combat Boots for A Cause

The independent, family-owned makers of the iconic Shiner Bock, are continuing their partnership with the Boot Campaign, an organization dedicated to honor and restore the lives of veterans and military families, for their annual Toast Our Troops Campaign.

Shiner Releases Cocktail-Inspired Hard Seltzer Variety Pack

Texas-based Shiner Beer released “Tall ‘Tails” this week, a variety 12-pack of cocktail-inspired hard seltzers.

Press Clips: Shiner Debuts New Brand Campaign; Gopuff Acquires UK’s Dija

Spoetzl Brewery’s Shiner Beer launched its first new brand platform in five years last week, with a campaign to make Shiner a part of modern Texas culture, according to AdWeek.

Balcones Announces New Texas Bock, Made in Partnership with Spoetzl Brewery

Balcones Distilling announced today the return of its widely successful special release, Balcones Texas Bock whisky.

Shiner Maker The Spoetzl Brewery Signs on as BeerBoard Brewing Partner

BeerBoard, the leader in real-time data, insights and consumer engagement for the on-premise, has announced that Shiner and The Spoetzl Brewery has signed on as the company’s latest brewing partner. The move adds one of the largest independent craft brewers in the country to BeerBoard’s vast and growing brewery client list.

The Spoetzl Brewery Releases Shiner Ruby Redbird

Texas fan-favorite craft beer Shiner Ruby Redbird is a delicious alternative to a basic vodka soda with just 95-calories with 1g of sugar, 3 carbs and 0g of fat.

Last Call: Drake Strikes Partnership with Canopy Growth; Walmart Adds Curbside Pickup for Alcohol Purchases

In this week’s edition of Last Call: Drake and Canopy Growth partner to launch More Life Growth Company; Walmart offers curbside pickup of alcohol in 29 states; JetBlue to offer Truly Hard Seltzer; and more news bites.

Spoetzl Brewery’s Shiner Bock Named Exclusive Beer of Florida Georgia Line’s ‘Can’t Say I Ain’t Country Tour’

Spoetzl Brewery, Texas’ oldest craft brewery and brewer of Shiner Beers, announces that award-winning Shiner Bock will support GRAMMY-nominated duo Florida Georgia Line’s upcoming CAN’T SAY I AINT COUNTRY TOUR. The details of the tour come as a follow up to the announcement of FGL’s fourth studio album on BMLG Records, also titled CAN’T SAY I AINT COUNTRY which will be available on February 15.

Shiner Beers Appoints The Richards Group as Lead Creative Agency

Spoetzl Brewery, brewer of Shiner Bock, announced the appointment of The Richards Group as lead creative agency partner for the brand. The Richards Group will oversee creative for Shiner Beers which is the oldest independently owned Texan craft brewery.

Spoetzl Brewery Collaborates with Balcones Distilling on Spoetzl Märzen

Spoetzl Brewery, the iconic 109-year-old Texas craft brewery, announces the release of a new limited-edition craft brew, Spoetzl Märzen, in collaboration with Balcones Distilling.
